report.title: Record attributes for verification wih hiddens
report.description: Report used to retrieve custom attributes of an occurrence record which are not included in a list of attributes to ignore.
report.query: select DISTINCT ON (a.id) o.id, 'Record' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, oaw.weight as w1, fsb1.weight as w2, fsb2.weight as w3, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN 'Text'::bpchar WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN 'Lookup List'::bpchar WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN 'Integer'::bpchar WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN 'Boolean'::bpchar WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN 'Float'::bpchar WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN 'Specific Date'::bpchar WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN 'Vague Date'::bpchar ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN CASE WHEN substring(a.caption from (char_length(a.caption)-5) for 4) = 'link' AND substring(av.text_value from 0 for 4) = 'http' THEN '' || av.text_value || '' ELSE av.text_value END WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join occurrence_attribute_values av on av.occurrence_id=o.id and av.deleted=false join occurrence_attributes a on a.id=av.occurrence_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value left join occurrence_attributes_websites oaw on oaw.occurrence_attribute_id=a.id and oaw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=oaw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#) union select DISTINCT ON (a.id) o.id, 'Parent sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, saw.weight, fsb1.weight, fsb2.weight, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN 'Text'::bpchar WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN 'Lookup List'::bpchar WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN 'Integer'::bpchar WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN 'Boolean'::bpchar WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN 'Float'::bpchar WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN 'Specific Date'::bpchar WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN 'Vague Date'::bpchar ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE WHEN g.title IS NULL THEN CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END ELSE g.title END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join sample_attribute_values av on av.sample_id=s.parent_id and av.deleted=false join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join sample_attributes_websites saw on saw.sample_attribute_id=a.id and saw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=saw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value left join groups g on g.id=av.int_value and a.system_function='group_id' where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#) union select DISTINCT ON (a.id) o.id, 'Sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, a.id as attr_id, saw.weight, fsb1.weight, fsb2.weight, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN 'Text'::bpchar WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN 'Lookup List'::bpchar WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN 'Integer'::bpchar WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN 'Boolean'::bpchar WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN 'Float'::bpchar WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN 'Specific Date'::bpchar WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN 'Vague Date'::bpchar ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE WHEN g.title IS NULL THEN CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END ELSE g.title END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join sample_attribute_values av on av.sample_id=o.sample_id and av.deleted=false join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value left join sample_attributes_websites saw on saw.sample_attribute_id=a.id and saw.deleted=false left join form_structure_blocks fsb1 on fsb1.id=saw.form_structure_block_id left join form_structure_blocks fsb2 on fsb2.id=fsb1.parent_id left join groups g on g.id=av.int_value and a.system_function='group_id' where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and (a.system_function<>'cms_user_id' or a.system_function is null) and lower(coalesce(#testagainst#,'')) #operator# (#attrs#)

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

param.name: attrs
param.description: CSV list of attributes to include or exclude. Lowercase.

param.name: testagainst
param.description: Test for fields to include or exclude using the caption or the system function of the custom attribute

param.name: operator
param.description: Do you want to include only the list of attributes you've defined, or exclude them?
